comments:
I received the following error when creating a Web project with the "Add project to an EAR" checkbox enabled. May be related to 126719.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core 4 0 2006-02-07 09:15:46.312
!MESSAGE Failed while installing Dynamic Web Module 2.4.
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.operation.FacetProjectCreationOperation.addDefaultFacetsInProject(FacetProjectCreationOperation.java:154)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.operation.FacetProjectCreationOperation.addDefaultFactets(FacetProjectCreationOperation.java:197)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.project.facet.J2EEFacetInstallDelegate.installEARFacet(J2EEFacetInstallDelegate.java:67)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.web.project.facet.WebFacetInstallDelegate.execute(WebFacetInstallDelegate.java:163)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.FacetedProject.callDelegate(FacetedProject.java:726)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.FacetedProject.modifyInternal(FacetedProject.java:348)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.FacetedProject.access$0(FacetedProject.java:247)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.FacetedProject$1.run(FacetedProject.java:232)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1721)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.internal.FacetedProject.modify(FacetedProject.java:237)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.AddRemoveFacetsWizard.performFinish(AddRemoveFacetsWizard.java:348)
	at org.eclipse.wst.web.ui.internal.wizards.NewProjectDataModelFacetWizard.performFinish(NewProjectDataModelFacetWizard.java:173)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.AddRemoveFacetsWizard$2.run(AddRemoveFacetsWizard.java:283)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1721)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.AddRemoveFacetsWizard$3.run(AddRemoveFacetsWizard.java:297)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

Yes, this is a duplicate of 126719.  We can add code to protect against this NPE as well as eliminate from getting into this situation by fixing the UI under 126719.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 126719 ***
